scenes.description: Performance of the song "Journey" by Mori Calliope with her backup dancers and live band.
Transition and audience cheers after the song performance.
MC section where Mori Calliope addresses the audience, mentioning the concert's theme and the wildfires.

subtitles.english: Cheers, eating away, exquisite beauty

subtitles.english: Through emotions, my head is paging

subtitles.english: The energy's still going, going, going

subtitles.original: 三界で頭は day-trip
subtitles.english: In the three worlds, my head's on a day-trip

subtitles.original: 華やかな staging
subtitles.english: A brilliant staging

subtitles.original: 賛成で頭は crazy crazy crazy yeah yeah
subtitles.english: In agreement, my head's crazy crazy crazy yeah yeah

subtitles.original: Ehem! Mean... wait a minute.
subtitles.english: Ehem! Mean... wait a minute.

subtitles.original: Wait, why do you have skin?
subtitles.english: Wait, why do you have skin?

subtitles.original: Why do you all have skin? I'm confused.
subtitles.english: Why do you all have skin? I'm confused.

subtitles.original: No, don't tear it off! Not now! Not yet at least.
subtitles.english: No, don't tear it off! Not now! Not yet at least.

subtitles.original: I like to think there's a skeleton inside of everybody.
subtitles.english: I like to think there's a skeleton inside of everybody.

subtitles.original: So just stay... stay as you are.
subtitles.english: So just stay... stay as you are.

subtitles.original: What's up everyone!
subtitles.english: What's up everyone!

subtitles.original: Welcome to Grimoire, Mori Calliope's 2nd concert!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Grimoire, Mori Calliope's 2nd concert!

subtitles.original: And who am I, you ask? Who am I?
subtitles.english: And who am I, you ask? Who am I?

subtitles.original: Say my name!
subtitles.english: Say my name!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for coming out you guys.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming out you guys.

subtitles.original: I have dreamed about this concert. It's all I've been able to think about.
subtitles.english: I have dreamed about this concert. It's all I've been able to think about.

subtitles.original: I dreamed about the name, I dreamed about what songs I'd perform.
subtitles.english: I dreamed about the name, I dreamed about what songs I'd perform.

subtitles.original: I dreamed about what I'd look like, what I'd wear...
subtitles.english: I dreamed about what I'd look like, what I'd wear...

subtitles.original: ...and I dreamed about all of you!
subtitles.english: ...and I dreamed about all of you!

subtitles.original: Welcome, welcome.
subtitles.english: Welcome, welcome.

subtitles.original: Matter of fact, hold on, hold on a second.
subtitles.english: Matter of fact, hold on, hold on a second.

subtitles.original: What was that that I heard? By the way...
subtitles.english: What was that that I heard? By the way...

subtitles.original: ...what was that? People outside cheering "Boat goes binted"?
subtitles.english: ...what was that? People outside cheering "Boat goes binted"?

subtitles.original: What's wrong with you!?
subtitles.english: What's wrong with you!?

subtitles.original: Ha! Get a load of these boneheads.
subtitles.english: Ha! Get a load of these boneheads.

subtitles.original: No, they're just excited to be here. It's fine.
subtitles.english: No, they're just excited to be here. It's fine.

subtitles.original: You guys are excited to be here, it's fine.
subtitles.english: You guys are excited to be here, it's fine.

subtitles.original: Now listen.
subtitles.english: Now listen.

subtitles.original: All right, what did you guys think about "Mera Mera"?
subtitles.english: All right, what did you guys think about "Mera Mera"?

subtitles.original: That was hot, right? It was hot.
subtitles.english: That was hot, right? It was hot.

subtitles.original: Now listen, listen. Hold on.
subtitles.english: Now listen, listen. Hold on.

subtitles.original: Something I want to address really quick.
subtitles.english: Something I want to address really quick.

subtitles.original: We were really worried about the wildfires that were going on here, right?
subtitles.english: We were really worried about the wildfires that were going on here, right?

subtitles.original: We weren't sure if the concert was going to be able to be held safely.
subtitles.english: We weren't sure if the concert was going to be able to be held safely.

subtitles.original: But you know what? At the end of the day...
subtitles.english: But you know what? At the end of the day...

subtitles.original: ...at the end of the day, right? We thought, we have to do this concert.
subtitles.english: ...at the end of the day, right? We thought, we have to do this concert.

subtitles.original: If we can do something to cheer people up, right?
subtitles.english: If we can do something to cheer people up, right?

subtitles.original: Cheer you guys up and do something fun together...
subtitles.english: Cheer you guys up and do something fun together...

subtitles.original: ...and you know, get back to thinking about fun shit, right? Yeah.
subtitles.english: ...and you know, get back to thinking about fun shit, right? Yeah.

subtitles.original: So here we are.
subtitles.english: So here we are.

subtitles.original: This is the very first time that we are doing a solo live in America!
subtitles.english: This is the very first time that we are doing a solo live in America!

subtitles.original: I heard you guys. There they go. USA! USA! USA! USA!
subtitles.english: I heard you guys. There they go. USA! USA! USA! USA!

subtitles.original: Awesome. Rather patriotic, very nice.
subtitles.english: Awesome. Rather patriotic, very nice.

subtitles.original: But you know what? We actually have a band that came all the way from Japan!
subtitles.english: But you know what? We actually have a band that came all the way from Japan!
